title: Process Rental Application
description: A prospective tenant has submitted an application for a rental property. The property manager must process it.

tasks.description: Verify the rental application is complete and the application fee has been paid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all required fields are filled and payment is received.

tasks.description: Run a credit and background check on the applicant.
tasks.expected_outcome: A credit and background check is successfully initiated using the applicant's information.

tasks.description: Based on the screening report and income verification, approve or deny the application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares screening results to company policy and makes an approval/denial decision, logging the reason.
